comment: Dr. Kieran was a top notch teacher. I high enjoyed the class and the assignments were relevant and easy to do. If you can take this professor, PLEASE do yourself a favor and do it!

Tough grader and LOTS of assignments, but I do really like Dr. Kieran. I've taken her for Careers and Abnormal. She is a good lecturer and cares about her students. I feel like I learned a lot from her. She's not easy by any means, but if you want to make a career in Pysch and you ENJOY Pysch, she's great!
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Took this course during the spring. She docks points for EVERY little thing! It's almost like her life mission. Nothing is ever good enough for her. If you miss a period a question mark, or the smallest detail she will take off 10-12 points. Do yourself a favor and skip her.

I took her during the summer and I wouldn't take her ever again. She docks points for EVERY little thing. It seems like it's her life mission. Yes, there is extra credit but by the time she docks all your points off that's your extra credit.

class was super easy, but there is a lot to do. online activities, lots of discussions, quizzes, i think 4 exams, and 1 essay. the essay was super hard, but i made a C on it and still passed the class with an A. there is so much extra credit! there is a lot of assignments but it is all easy and there is extra credit for everything. i learned a lot!

I know it's only 5 weeks into the semester but, this professor is great. She has a very detailed rubric for each assignment which pretty much guarantees you at least an B or an A if you followed it precisely. She also drops your 3 lowest quiz grades. Tests are on lockdown and webcam, but the quizzes are not. Weekly discussions with bonus points.

I loved Dr. Kieran's careers in psychology course! The assignments were fun and useful. If you are an average student and you put in effort you will come out of this class with an A. Dr. Kieran is very descriptive with her teachings and straightforward with her expectations. She honestly cares for her students. Would def take again.

I enjoyed Dr. K's class. The course was well designed and easy to navigate, the assignments weren't too intense, and she's a pretty nice person who gives a fair bit of extra credit. My only real critique is that it would occasionally take her a long time to grade, especially discussion posts.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Online Savvy

comment: I took her online summer course. Online elements are straightforward and organized. Several quizzes, discussion boards, three tests, and four projects. Many extra credit opportunities. Lecture/reading heavy.  Not too difficult, but a bit of an excessive workload considering the class. The class is supposed to help you, not stress you out even more.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Kieran gives many opportunities to receive extra points. There are weekly quizzes and discussion posts, so be sure to pay attention to the weekly due dates. The discussion points can get extra points and she drops the 3 lowest quiz grades. Attendance is mandatory but class is only once a week and you can miss several before affecting your grade

I love her! She is so kind and caring, all the work given is very clear and easy to follow. The textbook and powerpoints will prepare you for tests, they never include anything she has not covered. Weekly discussion posts/quizzes. Take her if you can :)

She is a great professor. The only thing I didn't like was that she had a 'flipped classroom'. So basically we had to listen to her pre-recorded lectures on our own, and then we talked in class. Personally, I didn't like this bc got easily distracted. She does give plenty of extra credit and is nice. Wants us to succeed. STUDY for exams!!

I really loved professor Kieran. She really taught me so much about careers in psych and she was always ready to help students. The class is a bit over-average on the work load but it was all relevant and easy to navigate. There is a lot of extra credit, and her projects were mostly fun as well.
Online course was very straight forward. Quizzes were not on lockdown. Genuinely passionate about the material. Study for the tests and you'll get an A.

This is honestly the easiest class Ive ever taken. The prof is super sweet and gives a lot of extra credit. Quizzes are open book/note and she drops 3 of your lowest quiz scores. You can easily get over 100% in the class. If you fail this class you need to evaluate yourself.

Took her Online class. Weekly assignments but all very easy. No textbook required, PowerPoint and Lectures only. The test are easy because theyre strictly based from PowerPoint (lecture material isnt on test). If you can keep up with weekly assignments and do well on test you can certainly get an A but I wouldnt call it an easy A.

Take her! She is very clear in lectures and if you attend and pay attention you basically have everything you need for the exams. She is very friendly and even helped me with a project for an entirely different class two semesters after I had taken her class. She even remembered me when I emailed. And Im not a memorable student, in my opinion.

Dr. K was the absolute best professor I've ever had. As this was an online class (due to covid), all lectures were prerecorded and students were expected to complete discussion posts. Tons of opportunity to gain extra points is given and Dr. K will absolutely work with you if needed. Fantastic lectures and a fantastic teacher. Absolutely love Dr. K
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Amazing lectures

comment: There were never any papers in this class - had 3 (or 4) tests and that's it. Lecture-based but incredibly easy class to pass. Teaching-wise, she's hilarious and amazing. Her lectures are never boring, and she's very respectful of others if you're respectful of her time as well.

I loved Dr K. She does make you work and you do need to read the chapters, but she is a wonderful teacher. I loved her power point lectures, studying those really helped me do well in her class. There are several extra credit opportunities. She is a great choice!

I took online spring semester Dr. Kieran's Abnromal Psychology and it was pretty good. Even though it was online, the TA Lindsay was really helpful and I recommend getting to know the TA of future classes. She's a bit strict on her one essay so make sure you dive heavily into her rubric very carefully. Study the slide shows & book for the test.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: Dr. K is a great professor. She is super sweet and genuine. You can tell that she truly cares about the well-being of her students. Lots of class discussion, 3 exams, 3 projects, and a couple of extra credit opportunities. I learned a lot in this class & it made me love psychology even more. Pay attention during lecture. PP slides alone won't help.

I've taken her twice & both were VERY difference experiences. I will not be taking her again. For this class you have 3 exams & 3, detailed projects. Exams are multiple choice and SA, & her study guides are bogus. She graded assignments HARSHLY, with majority of the class failing the second project & she did nothing about it. Attendance is graded

I had Dr K for my Careers in Psych class and she was amazing! Very sweet and cares about her students. The textbook is required and she compresses it into slides for her lectures, which makes her tests easy. You can tell she cares about her students and she is very generous with grading projects, etc. Get into her class her if you can!!!

lots of extra credit opportunities. she gives a lot of pop quizzes, but they're quite easy if you did the reading. it's a very helpful class, and she cares a lot about her students. make sure to follow all directions for assignments. the syllabus is crucial to the way she teaches.

Dr. Kieran is one of the most caring professors I've ever had at KSU. There were 2 tests and 2 projects in her class. Projects were easy, but time consuming. Her tests were more difficult because she never tells you what's going to be on it. Just says that the powerpoints should be our study guide. Overall, sweet lady. Easy class. Just study.

Shes a great professor, understands what shes teaching and loves doing it. Her exams are application based and there is no study guide, so going in without having studied at least a little is not an option. One 5 page paper but its SUPER EASY and actually fun to do. A good bit of homework to do. Love the class and I love the professor.

Dr. Kieran is one of the best professors Ive taken at kennesaw. Her tests are straight from the power points, she even bolds the terms so we know which ones to learn. Her hw is through learning curve so you have to buy an access code for the textbook, or you can do all the assignments in the 2 week free trial.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Come to class. Engage. The rest is easy. 2 exams and a final. Article critique, one independent project, and a self examination paper. Easy A if you just do the minimum. I didn't use the textbook and got an A

I took her hybrid class and it was laid out really well. I highly recommend taking her for any of her classes if possible. She is passionate about her subject. If you study and put in effort, you will get the grade you want. Review sessions with UTA is highly advised, if times work with you, because they are super useful. She has great humor too!!
took the hybrid. shes funny and smart, wants to help, easy tests, not too much work. one big essay but not too bad. completely recommend and will take again!

Man I loved Dr. Kieran! Her tests and assignments are not too difficult, but are still a good assessment if you're actually learning. The discussions in this course are so great. Dr. Kieran really cares about her students succeeding, but also their self care. Take her!!!
Unclear lectures on an already confusing subject, students give up trying to learn material, examples are poor and unclear, just random ideas she comes up with on the spot
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY

comment: She's my favorite professor. You will learn and laugh in a very tough class. Accessible, seriously cares for her students-- Love Dr. Kieran, take her whenever you can

Dr. Kieran is an awesome professor! She is funny and very approachable. She does grade pretty tough, but she also gives detailed feedback. There is a project/presentation for this class. Be sure to get started early if you can. Looking over the quizzes at the end of the book chapters will help with the exams and quizzes she gives.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Get ready to read

comment: Dr. K is so sweet and funny. One of my favorite profs at KSU. Attendance isn't required, but go to class because the lectures are great. She also genuinely cares for her students and will help you out with any questions. She knew the material and was passionate about psychology, which made the class fun and interesting. Literally inspired me

This is one of the hardest classes, but only because the material is very dense. Dr. K gives you everything you need to make an A and is very willing to help you out. Her lectures are hilarious and very intriguing. I definitely recommend every psych student taking this class because you learn a lot of valuable information.
Great Professor. She is tough but she makes the material so interesting.

After the first exam she decided to have open discussion instead of lecturing over material. She also made attendance 10% of the grade, so you had to waste your time and attend. She also grades personally. So, if she feels like you deserve a C even though you earned a B, you're getting a C. Not accessible after class. Find someone else.

Dr. Kieran is the best Psychology professor I've had at KSU. She constantly works to make sure that we have to most up-to-date information on the subject. She has short answer portions on her tests, and those can be tricky, but if you study, it's fine. Four tests including final, which is cumulative. 4 online quizzes. & 1 (fun) paper. Take her!!

Super interesting, super helpful, funny, blunt, goes out of her way to help students understand, has built in extra credit assignments. I took her for abnormal and physio, both classes are hard because they're upper level classes, the material is hard. Dr. Kieran goes out of her way to make lectures interesting and her lecture slides are beautiful.

Dr. Kieran was an amazing professor for Physio. Lectures are long, but she makes it fun and easy. Her test aren't very hard if you study, they do cover a lot of information though. I got an A on the paper and I wrote it the night before it was due, it's not hard at all. Take her, you won't regret it. She also gives extra credit.

Dr. Kieran is a wonderful person and she's brilliant! She's there for you when you need it. There are only 3 tests including the final, one paper, an annotated bibliography that's an easy A, and a group project that wasn't too bad. I'm taking her again for Abnormal Psych next semester :)

Paper worth 200 points, no direction given, example paper is riddled with errors, and is unwilling to help us out. Exam average was close to 73's for all exams, and the average for the paper was 72. Information overload compared to what will be on the exams. Exams are difficult. I worked my butt off and I barely have a B.

The class material is fascinating. The professor, however,  is not. We received virtually no instruction for a term paper worth 200 points of our grade. Expectations were not clear whatsoever. It is NOT a compliment that the class average for exams AND the term paper is a 75, it's evident there are gaps in her directions and expectations.

she's a nice person, but an awful teacher. often times unclear about what she wants and what we need to know about the exam and for the papers. goes off topic a lot. doesn't go over the exam. SHE'S A HARD GRADER. you think you got an A on the paper? nope you got a C.  two papers, three exams (including the final)

Great professor, but her lectures sometimes get off topic because other students chip in on their stories. Her tests are hard, but you have to study the powerpoints precisely. Overall, great teacher, but just needs to be more clear on what's on tests.

I made an A, but worked hard. There's one paper and it was an easy A. The tests are what is kind of hard. Pay attention to boldunderlinedcapitalized words on her power points. There are some short answer and fill in the blank questions but if you study you're good. You don't need the book, I didn't look at it once all semester. Great professor!!

Cross Cultural Psych. Posted previously saying might get an A but got a B. Most people got Bs who wanted As. Some thought were getting Bs got Cs. Must study everything on slides beyond study guides. Read articles and book to ensure an A. Not an easy A. But great teacher.

Study slides well for tests, not book. The book just helps to understand more and she tells us to read it before class so can discuss better but slides are most important. Didn't study slides well on first test and got a c on it. But think can get an A by the end.

AWESOME professor! She puts the slides online, and the tests come primarily from those. One big project due in the semester, but it isn't too bad. I would definitely take her. She makes everything perfectly clear and is always willing to answer any questions.

I would try to take any other professor over her. She isn't terrible but never let us go over our tests/quizzes, or never see them for that matter, so we never knew what we got wrong and right. Interesting material, but if I could go back, I'd take Wolfe.

Professor Kieran is absolutely wonderful and I highly recommend her. The class is really interesting and the textbook is actually a good read. She provides slides for every chapter and the tests and quizzes pretty much come straight from there as well as lecture. Easy class. Easy extra credit opportunities. There's a project but it's easy and fun.
